General.Name: Qingdao Victall Railway Co Ltd
General.Description: Qingdao Victall Railway Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, sale, and service of supporting products for rail transit vehicles in China and internationally. The company provides vehicle interior products, vacuum toilet collection systems, metal structural parts, modular products, and vehicle exterior structures. It also provides high-speed rail and urban rail supporting products, exterior parts, car front parts, toilet systems, air duct systems, kitchen systems, front opening and closing mechanism systems, lighting systems, high-speed rail BC parts, etc. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Qingdao, China.
